DOC.brief_summary: Objectives - To evaluate 4-year clinical outcome ceramic veneer Computer Aided Design/Computer Aided Manufacturing ( CAD/CAM ) Co-Cr single crown support natural teeth posterior region . Material method - Eighty-nine patient provide 120 ceramic veneer CAD/CAM Co-Cr single crown replace either premolar molar . Specific inclusion criterion need tooth preparation standardize perform 2 expert prosthodontist . CAD/CAM Co-Cr framework fabricate veneered ceramic . The restoration cement use eugenol-free zinc oxide luting agent . The patient recall 1 , 6 , 12 , 24 , 36 48 month . The survival success restoration evaluate . The technical esthetic outcome examine use United States Public Health Service criterion . The biologic outcome analyze abutment contralateral teeth descriptive statistic perform .
DOC.brief_title: Posterior CAD/CAM Cobalt-chromium Alloy Single Crowns : 4-year Prospective Clinical Study
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : good general health American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) ASA I ASA II condition ; periodontal health Angle class I occlusal relationship minimum 10 couple opponent teeth good oral hygiene evident sign parafunctions and/or temporomandibular disorder . periodontal health abutment teeth ( absence tooth mobility , absence furcation involvement ) ; proper positioning abutment teeth dental arch ( tooth axis adequate SC ) sufficient occlusalcervical height clinical crown abutment teeth ( â‰¥ 4 mm ) retention SC vital endodontically treat clinically sound state abutment teeth ; abutment teeth oppose natural teeth . Exclusion criterion : high caries activity presence periodontal disease abutment tooth occlusalcervical height abutment tooth < 4 mm reduce interocclusal distance supraerupted oppose teeth unfavorable crowntoroot ratio severe facet , clench and/or bruxism presence removable partial denture ( RPDs ) pregnancy lactation alcohol and/or drug addiction
